name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Mechanical Engineer with a robust background in **3D CAD**, **CATIA V5**, **Siemens NX**, **SolidWorks**, and **Creo**, I offer 8 years of experience in delivering innovative mechanical designs and solutions. My expertise extends to Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) using **3DExperience**, **Enovia**, **Teamcenter**, and **Windchill**, ensuring efficient project management and collaboration throughout the design process.
I have a proven track record in advanced analysis techniques including **FEA** and **CFD**, enabling the development of high-quality products while adhering to industry standards and best practices. My process-oriented approach emphasizes **additive manufacturing** and **rapid prototyping**, combined with a strong command of GD&T and design for manufacture and assembly, optimizing product feasibility and manufacturability.
Additionally, I excel in problem-solving and time management, leveraging effective communication and collaboration skills to foster teamwork and drive project success.
